IX.iii.1.A.2.g
.
Handling Unreliable Income Reporting
If a beneficiary has a history of unreliable reporting of income or expenses, the claims processor may at any time ask for proof of income or expenses before awarding benefits or before awarding a higher payment amount.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A - General Information on the Effect Income and Net Worth Have on Pension and Parents’ Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC)
